task_definition_name: Mifos Mobile CN app: Loan Review form not visible
description:
## Objective
Loan Review form should be visible

### Description
1. Go to String.xml
2. Find the string array "loan_application_steps"  add the fourth item "Review"

####References
https://www.homeandlearn.co.uk/android/grid_view_array.html

## How to get help 
If you need help, be sure to post your question to our [developer mailing list](http://mifos.org/resources/community/communications/#mailing-lists) or ask in our [chatroom](https://gitter.im/openMF/mifos-mobile-cn).
